mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.name_ AS name, b.sex, b.tel, b.province_name AS provinceName, b.city_name AS cityName, b.area_name AS areaName, b.street_name AS streetName, b.community_name AS communityName, b.house_name AS houseName, b.id_card AS idCard, b.id_card_obv AS idCardObv, b.id_card_rev AS idCardRev FROM sb_company_recycler a LEFT JOIN sb_recyclers b ON a.recycler_id = b.id WHERE a.company_id = #{companyId} AND a.status_ = '0'

SELECT count(1) FROM sb_company_recycler a LEFT JOIN sb_recyclers b ON a.recycler_id = b.id LEFT JOIN sb_recyclers_range c ON a.company_id = c.company_id AND a.recycler_id = c.recyclers_id LEFT JOIN sb_company_community d ON d.id = c.community_id LEFT JOIN sb_community_house_name f ON f.id = c.community_house_id WHERE a.company_id = #{companyId} AND a.status_ = '1'
AND a.card_type = #{cardType}
AND b.tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{tel},'%')
AND b.name_ LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
